divs: Sighting Detailscamping last night,could not sleep,set up in the tent and lite a smoke and its pitch black out 1am,saw a flash of light about 10 feet in front of tent in corner of eye,turned to look at what it was and saw another ball of light come out of the ground,that was two of them,shined my flash light at the spot and another orb came out of the ground and fly straight up.freaked me out but didnt scare me.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Vinton
There were no other sightings in Vinton on or around May 9th 2012
